    Estadio CDF, it's a webOS application that allows you to enjoy the contents of CDF Live and On Demand (VOD) through streaming.

  • The Goal

    The goal of the redesign was to create an attractive and functional interface for tv, adapting the controls to the limitations of the device and showing the new identity of the sports pay TV channel.

üé¨ ONLINE VIDEO EDITOR FOR PUBLISHERS - FireClip

FireClip it's a web application that allows you to create and edit highlights videos from live or recent programming, to be published and distributed on the web, on your own video platforms and shared out by social media.

  • The problem

    The tool it had an inefficient interface and was limited to only basic editing functions

  • The Goal

    Create different stages of product development by gradually adding new features. The design was created to be used as a basis for the development of the next 3 years of the software.

Tool that allows you to create a reminder of how much time is left for the premiere of your next favorite movie. Demo

  • The problem

    There wasn't any app that would create reminders of the upcoming movie premieres so I decided to make one by myself.

  • The Goal

    Create a tool to satisfy my needs and those of other potential users, practice interface design skills, user experience and web development.
